title: Ten new Ambassadors and High Commissioners in Colombo
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Ten (10) new Ambassadors and High Commissioners handed over their credentials to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the President’s office on Friday 05th November. Accordingly eight (8) new Ambassadors from Switzerland, Norway, Mongolia, Cambodia, Mexico, Oman, Peru and Vietnam and two (2) new High Commissioners from…
